Description: Should the government increase environmental regulations on businesses to reduce carbon emissions?
Should disposable products (such as plastic cups and cutlery) that contain less than 50% of biodegradable material be banned?
Should businesses be taxed for the water they use?
Should the government ban the use of 1080?
Do you support the use of genetically engineered crops and foods?
Do you support the use of hydraulic fracking to extract oil and natural gas resources?
